sys_app_scan_payload.serialized_record:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>!!!scope_name!!!.request_department</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Given a user, returns the users department.</description><name>request_department</name><script><![CDATA[var request_department = Class.create();
request_department.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    requestor_info: function() {
        var result = {};
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		if(gr.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userSelect'))){
			result.department = gr.getValue('department');
		}
		return JSON.stringify(result);
    },
    type: 'request_department'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_id>!!!sys_id_1454!!!</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_scope><sys_update_name/><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/></sys_script_include></record_update>
